required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence of Clopidogrel (Plavix) Resistance in Hemodialysis Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of Clopidogrel (Plavix) Resistance in Hemodialysis Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: North Shore Long Island Jewish Health System

clinical_study.source: North Shore Long Island Jewish Health System

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators are trying to find out if Clopidogrel (Plavix) is as effective in hemodialysis patients as in patients not hemodialysed.

detailed_description.textblock:
Cardiovascular disease is very frequent in hemodialysis patients. Lot of hemodialysis patients are on Clopidogrel (plavix). Their is some evidence that clopidogrel is not effective in hemodialysis as it is effective in patient without kidney problem.
VerifyNow plavix is a machine that measure the ability of the blood to clot after giving plavix.
We will collect blood from hemodialysis patients on plavix and check the ability of their blood to clot and thus indirectly measuring the efficacy of Plavix.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.description: Plavix resistance is reported using the PRU values given by the VerifyNow machine. PRU is P2Y12 Reaction Units which is correlated with platelet aggregation.

secondary_outcome.measure: assess the risk factors for plavix resistance in the hemodialysis population
secondary_outcome.description: Coronary Artery Disease (CAD) is very common in dialysis patients. Treatment of CAD include medical therapy, stent placement and surgery. Since Plavix is a medication that is commonly used after stent placement, we would like to assess the efficacy of this medication in this patient population.

study_pop.textblock: Hemodialysis patients who are taking plavix daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients on hemodialysis taking Plavix
Exclusion Criteria:
- known to have bleeding disorder
- Severely anemic with hemoglobin level (Hb) < 10g/dl
- Low Platelets < 10000

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: North Shore Long Island Jewish Health System
responsible_party.investigator_title: Nephrology Attending, Assoc. Chair of Medicine
